name: POSK BHOP 2
description:
AFTER RUN A GAME YOU PRESS TO THE START, WAIT THIS A SECOND TO LOADING TO THE GAME (AVG SECONDS: 11 SECONDS) (iMPORTANT) AND PLAY

(FOR PC AND LAPTOP HAVE KEYBOARD OUTSIDE) EXIT : ALT + F4

(LAPTOP) EXIT: ALT + TAB AND DRAG MOUSE TO X ICON AND PRESS TO CLOSE

IF GAME LAGGING, EXIT AND GO TO DESKTOP, CLICK RIGHT MOUSE AND CHOOSE DISPLAY, CHANGE RESOLUTION TO 800X600 OR OTHER AND PLAY AGAIN

AFTER EXIT THE GAME, GO TO DESKTOP, CLICK RIGHT MOUSE AND CHOOSE DISPLAY, CHANGE RESOLUTION TO 1366X768 OR OTHER TO SET SCREEN TO DEFAULT

DONATE ME: https://tinyurl.com/2cktcbb8 THANKS FOR PLAY OUR GAMES
